messages.content: Show me sales trends for last month

📈 Great news! Sales are trending upward this month with ₹85,000 total revenue (+12% vs last month). Kerala Burger leads with ₹32,000 revenue. Peak sales occur on weekends. Would you like me to forecast next month's performance?
Which menu items are our best sellers?

🏆 Top Performers this month: 1) Kerala Burger (₹32k, +15%), 2) Chicken Burger (₹28k, +8%), 3) Fish Burger (₹18k, +5%). 📉 Underperformers: Seafood Combo (₹3k), Classic Combo (₹5k). Kerala-style items consistently outperform classic variants.
Predict Kerala Burger sales for next month

🔮 Based on current trends, I predict Kerala Burger will generate ₹38,000-42,000 next month (90% confidence). This represents a 15-20% increase from current month. You'll need approximately 200 burger buns and 30kg ground beef to meet demand.
Compare this month vs last month revenue

📊 Month-over-month comparison: Revenue up 12% (₹85,000 vs ₹76,000). Menu items grew 18%, raw material costs increased 8%. Net profit margin improved from 22% to 25%. Kerala Burger drove most growth (+₹8,000).
📈 Kerala Burger: ₹32,000 revenue this month, 107 units sold (+15% vs last month). Peak sales on weekends (Fri-Sun). Current stock sufficient for 2 weeks. Strong growth momentum continues!
What about next month's forecast for that?

🔮 Kerala Burger forecast for next month: ₹38,000-42,000 revenue (120-140 units, 90% confidence). Growth momentum continues with 15-20% increase expected. Inventory needs: 140 buns, 21kg ground beef, 14kg vegetables.
What inventory should I prioritize based on sales?

💡 Priority inventory based on sales analysis: 1) Ground beef (current: 8kg, high velocity, need 25kg), 2) Burger buns (low stock, 200pcs needed), 3) Tomatoes (expiring soon, consider promotions). Chicken stock sufficient for 2 weeks.
